name: @sco-techlab/node-multer-files
author: SCO Techlab (Santiago Comeras Oteo) <sco.techlab@gmail.com> (https://web.sco-techlab.es/)
description: Easy nodejs / express / NestJS files management

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && nest build && cp ./package.json ./dist/node-multer-files && cp ./README.md ./dist/node-multer-files && cp ./tsconfig* ./dist/node-multer-files && chmod -R 777 ./dist
